SEARCH
Modul wbh.wbh_projekt_privatebuchhaltung
Package wbh.wbh_projekt_privatebuchhaltung.models.userProfile

Klasse Goal

java.lang.Object
wbh.wbh_projekt_privatebuchhaltung.models.userProfile.Goal
public class Goal extends Object
Represents a financial goal that a user aims to achieve. A goal is linked to a specific BankAccount and has a target value.

  • Konstruktordetails

    • Goal

      public Goal(int id, String name, String description, double goalValue, BankAccount bankAccount, Date startDate, Date endDate)
      Constructs a Goal with an explicit ID.
      Parameter:
      id - the unique identifier of the goal
      name - the name of the goal
      description - a short description of the goal
      goalValue - the target value to reach
      bankAccount - the associated bank account
      startDate - the start date of the goal
      endDate - the end date of the goal

    • Goal

      public Goal(String name, String description, double goalValue, BankAccount bankAccount, Date startDate, Date endDate)
      Constructs a Goal without an explicit ID.
      Parameter:
      name - the name of the goal
      description - a short description of the goal
      goalValue - the target value to reach
      bankAccount - the associated bank account
      startDate - the start date of the goal
      endDate - the end date of the goal

    • getCompletionRate

      public double getCompletionRate()
      Calculates the completion rate of the goal based on the current bank balance.
      Gibt zurück:
      a value between 0 and 1 representing the completion percentage

    • isCompleted

      public boolean isCompleted()
      Checks if the goal has been completed.
      Gibt zurück:
      true if the current balance meets or exceeds the goal value, otherwise false
